name: shadow-punch

effect_entries.effect: Hits Pokémon under the effects of dig and fly.

effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
An unavoidable punch that
is thrown from shadows.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
An unavoidable punch that
is thrown from shadows.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user throws a
punch from the
shadows. It cannot
be evaded.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

punch at the foe from
the shadows.
The punch lands
without fail.
